front.title: A LoST extension to return complete and similar location info

abstract.t: This document describes an extension to the LoST protocol of RFC 5222 that allows additional civic location information to be returned in a <findServiceResponse>. This extension supports two use cases: First, when the input location is valid but lacks some Civic Address elements, the LoST server can provide a completed form. Second, when the input location is invalid, the LoST server can identify one or more feasible ("similar") locations. This extension is applicable when the location information in the <findService> request uses the Basic Civic profile as described in RFC 5222 or another profile whose definition provides instructions concerning its use with this extension.
